mapper.insert: insert into customerinquiry(name, email, phone, inquirylist, devicephone, devicemodelname, runenvironment, runplace, runtime1, runtime2, runcontent, inquirytitle, inquirycontent, reply) values(#{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{inquirylist}, #{devicephone}, #{devicemodelname}, #{runenvironment}, #{runplace}, #{runtime1}, #{runtime2}, #{runcontent}, #{inquirytitle}, #{inquirycontent}, #{reply})
